content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed shell commands to export the PYTHONPATH and check its value, using "export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/". I used various commands to search for specific rental companies and lodging options near Naeroyfjord for kay
"""

"""
[Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/", "https://www.firebirdtours.com/blog/top-10-norway-kayaking-trip-routes", "https://www.muchbetteradventures.com/magazine/a-guide-to-kayaking-in-norway/", "https://kayakmoretomorrow.com/norways-5-best-self-guided-sea-kayak-trips/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g190455-Activities-c61-t191-Norway.html", "https://expeditionengineering.com/kayaking-in-norway/", "https://www.kimkim.com/c/ultimate-guide-to-kayaking-rafting-in-norway", "https://www.wikiloc.com/trails/kayaking-canoeing/norway"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/", "question": "What are the best kayaking routes in Norway?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on the top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Verås Larsen, along with a paddling code for safety. It also offers tips and a list of companies for various outdoor activities, but another text is an advertisement for skiing with no information on kayaking routes.

Lofoten Islands\n2. Helgeland\n3. Geirangerfjord\n4. Jotunheimen\n5. Aurlandsfjord\n6. Rondane National Park\n7. Sognefjord\n8. Voss\n9. Hardangerfjord\n10. Telemark Canal\n\nPaddling code for safety:\n- Always wear a life jacket\n- Never paddle alone\n- Bring a map and compass\n- Be prepared for changing weather conditions\n\nFor more information and tips, visit https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "top_kayaking_routes.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: The top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Verås Larsen are:
1. Lofoten Islands
2. Helgeland
3. Geirangerfjord
4. Jotunheimen
5. Aurlandsfjord
6. Rondane National Park
7. Sognefjord
8. Voss
9. Hardangerfjord
10. Telemark Canal

Paddling code for safety:
- Always wear a life jacket
- Never paddle alone
- Bring a map and compass
- Be prepared for changing weather conditions

For more information and tips, visit https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best kayaking routes in Sweden"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.routesnorth.com/sweden/things-to-do-in-sweden/the-best-kayak-and-canoe-tours-in-sweden/", "https://visitsweden.com/what-to-do/nature-outdoors/canoeing-and-kayaking/canoeing-kayaking/", "https://www.wikiloc.com/trails/kayaking-canoeing/sweden", "https://outdoorfitnesssociety.com/adventure/places-to-kayak-and-canoe-scandinavia/", "https://scandification.com/kayak-in-sweden-kayaking-in-sweden/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g189806-Activities-c61-t191-Sweden.html", "https://misfitwanders.com/canoeing-sweden/", "https://www.traveltomtom.net/destinations/europe/sweden/self-guided-canoe-trip-in-sweden"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "top_kayaking_routes_sweden.txt", "text": "Top 5 kayaking routes in Sweden:\n1. The tutorial covers setting up the map, finding data, symbolizing the river, and labeling. It includes tips and links to documentation for unfamiliar parts. The author emphasizes the importance of considering the media of the final product before making the map and encourages readers to try making a map of their own favorite river.
